bibl.title: Jewish and Christian Scripture as Artifact and Canon

bibl.seg: Flanagan John, Papyrus 967 and the Text of Ezkiel: Parablepsis or an Original Text?

Craig A. Evans and H. Daniel Zacharias (Edd.), Jewish and Christian Scripture as Artifact and Canon = Studies in Scripture in Early Judaism and Christianity. 13 = Library of Second Temple Studies. 70 (London, 2009) pp. 106-116.
Discusses P. Princ. Scheide (= van Haelst 315; LDAB 3090).
